1.Title: Flaming Bars
1.Description: Whenever a squad member launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, the equipper gains 1 Charge stack, stacking up to 3 times. Upon activating their own <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the equipper consumes all Charge stacks, and each stack increases the skill's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>.
